JiwaDocument.Name: Add Lines to a Quote
JiwaDocument.Description: This plugin demonstrates how to programmatically add lines to a quote. A button is added to the ribbon of the Quote Entry form. Clicking on the button will add a series of parts to the quote that is on the screen. For this sample, the part nos. to add are hardcoded in the form of a list, but alternatively they could be read in from an external source, such as an excel spreadsheet. Finally, the button is only enabled for non-closed quotes.
JiwaDocument.Author: Jiwa Financials
